abstract: Under the terms of a settlement in a lawsuit over payment processing, merchants can charge higher prices to customers who pay with credit cards.
snippet: Under the terms of a settlement in a lawsuit over payment processing, merchants can charge higher prices to customers who pay with credit cards.
lead_paragraph: Retailers will be able to charge their customers more for paying with credit cards under the terms of a multibillion-dollar settlement announced late in the day on Friday.

headline.main: MasterCard and Visa Will Pay Billions to Settle Antitrust Suit
headline.print_headline: MasterCard And Visa Settle Claims Of Antitrust
